overview:
Terrence and Harry have been long time friends, since High School and also attended university together. Terry has a BA from the University of Western Ontario in Business Administration.

Prior to Ooolalashop.com, Terrence had many years of experience working with the Internet Retail and technology business. In January of 2009, Terry and Harry started UShopfast.com. They built this company to use all the best and most cost effective technologies to pass savings on to their customers. Using the same platform they built for UShopfast.com, in the Summer of 2010 they ported that platform over to Ooolalashop.com.

Terrenceâ€™s prior experience in online has been key to the success of UShopfast.com. Prior to this he was instrumental in building e-commerce businesses. He had successfully helped companies from inception to becoming multi-million dollar businesses. As a director and online advertising expert to these companies, he we was responsible for creating and managing all advertising campaigns for which resulted in consistent growth rates of 80% - 150% each year.

Terrence’s position, roles and responsibilities at Ooolalashop.com are managing the day-to-day operations, customer service and internet marketing.

Terrence currently lives in Vancouver, BC and runs their operations out of their Richmond, BC office and Chatsworth, CA location.
